Posts.Content: Grandma1940 wrote: The really crappy part about my daughter's breast cancer is that it is possibly a secondary cancer due to her hodgkins disease.  she had chemo for that over 25 years ago when she was just 16.  You should not have to go thru this twice!!  Anyway, has anyone else had this experience?  thanks, Grandma1940 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: breast cancer after hodgkins disease Grandma1940 Grandma1940

Posts.Content: Jun 17, 2008 07:46PM Grandma1940 wrote: Dear Ann and Deb, Thanks so much for replying.  i know exactly how your mom feels, Ann.  To see your child suffer and then not be able to fix it is so tough.  and then to have to go thru it all over again---well i can't think of any words that would describe my feelings.  I found out that if you look up hodgkins & breast cancer, it is not rare for this to happen.  But wow.  take care both of you.  you and all cancer patients are in my prayers.  love ya, carolyn
Posts.Title: breast cancer after hodgkins disease Grandma1940 Grandma1940
